title: Ticket #134: Regression test suite should tell us load of machine on each test
description: Each test (pragmatically, the .run script) should tell us the load of the machine before the test is run, and after it finishes. This way, if a machine gets heavily loaded and a test times out, we'll have a better understanding of why.
remarks:
Indeed. So now RunTest and RunDagTest drop time and load via date and uptime before the submit and after the test exits. pushed 1/29/9 am.

2009-Jan-30 16:38:44 by psilord:
Cool. resolving ticket.

Needs to have something for windows as cygwin does not have an uptime.
creator: psilord
